supervisor.model.tallier

Interface ITallier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChallengeDelayedTallier, ChallengeDelayedWithNIZKsTallier, EncryptedTallier, EncryptedTallierWithNIZKs, Tallier

    public interface ITallier
    Interface for all Tallier implementations.
    See Also:
    EncryptedTallier, Tallier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void challenged(ASExpression nonce)
      Called to indicate that a voting transaction is being challenged.
      void confirmed(ASExpression nonce)
      Called to indicate that the voting transaction indicated by the nonce is complete, and should be counted in the final tally.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigInteger> getReport()
      Gets the report of the total tally
      void recordVotes(byte[] ballot, ASExpression nonce)
      Records the votes from the given ballot, as an S-Expression in byte array format

    • Method Detail

      • getReport

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.math.BigInteger> getReport()
        Gets the report of the total tally
        Returns:
        the report as a map of Candidate to votes received.

      • recordVotes

        void recordVotes(byte[] ballot,
               ASExpression nonce)
        Records the votes from the given ballot, as an S-Expression in byte array format
        Parameters:
        ballot - - Verbatim version of the ballot to total
        nonce - - Nonce of this voting transaction

      • confirmed

        void confirmed(ASExpression nonce)
        Called to indicate that the voting transaction indicated by the nonce is complete, and should be counted in the final tally.
        Parameters:
        nonce - - Nonce of this voting transaction

      • challenged

        void challenged(ASExpression nonce)
        Called to indicate that a voting transaction is being challenged. This should result in the destruction of the ballot in the tallier.
        Parameters:
        nonce - - Nonce of this voting transaction
